name: CMGT_PortalPage_ContactUs
description: Portal interface page for contact us
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!wideScreen: {
    "TABLET_LANDSCAPE",
    "DESKTOP_NARROW",
    "DESKTOP",
    "DESKTOP_WIDE"
  },
  local!isWide: if(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_isPageWidth"(local!wideScreen),
    true,
    false
  ),
  local!portalConfig: rule!CMGT_INT_GET_PortalConfig(locale: "en_US"),
  local!brandingMap: local!portalConfig.result.body.brandingMap,
  local!cardContents: {
    a!map(
      icon: "route",
      primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:1afbed2b-fa81-4385-a684-bc52f0685b11",
      secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:d766ecc6-bf6d-401a-a377-1682c26ad33c"
    ),
    a!map(
      icon: "envelope-open-text",
      primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:41327863-bf56-4365-9a84-273ead0ea3bc",
      secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:4cd5bb1d-7d4b-4d70-bb21-3fd2ccf22c6e",
      secondaryTextColor: local!brandingMap.AccentColor
    ),
    a!map(
      icon: "phone",
      primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:8a524816-8f71-4ad1-942f-97819eee17f4",
      secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:0d780b0b-aa9d-4149-98bb-1bf36dd7a689"
    ),
    a!map(
      icon: "clock",
      primaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:83b7deb9-aa51-462f-9a84-9e050880051d",
      secondaryText: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:4894dddb-6a57-498d-aac1-bacf854f0939"
    )
  },
  rule!CMGT_PortalInterface_HeaderLayout(
    title: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:ec8fc354-bb1a-4b22-b76c-f7e86d3970c3",
    description: #"urn:appian:translation-string:v1:837e4a5e-9ca1-41e1-977a-7da074787a54",
    height: "SHORT_PLUS",
    contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
      columns: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(contents: {}, width: "EXTRA_NARROW" ,showWhen: local!isWide),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
          contents: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
              contents: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                items: local!cardContents,
                expression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
                  contents: {
                    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideLayout"(
                      items: {
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
                          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_stampField"(
                            labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
                            icon: fv!item.icon,
                            size: "SMALL",
                            shape: local!brandingMap.StandardStampShape,
                            marginAbove: "EVEN_LESS",
                            marginBelow: "EVEN_LESS",
                            contentColor: local!brandingMap.StandardStampContentColor,
                            backgroundColor: local!brandingMap.StandardStampBackgroundColor
                          ),
                          width: "MINIMIZE"
                        ),
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(width: "MINIMIZE"),
                        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sideBySideItem"(
                          item: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
                            value: {
                              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                                text: fv!item.primaryText,
                                style: "STRONG",
                                color: local!brandingMap.PrimaryTextColor,
                                size: "MEDIUM"
                              ),
                              char(10),
                              #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
                                text: fv!item.secondaryText,
                                color: a!defaultValue(
                                  fv!item.secondaryTextColor,
                                  local!brandingMap.SecondaryTextColor
                                )
                              )
                            },
                            marginAbove: "LESS"
                          )
                        )
                      },
                      alignVertical: "TOP",
                      marginAbove: "NONE",
                      marginBelow: "NONE"
                    )
                  },
                  height: "AUTO",
                  padding: "LESS",
                  marginAbove: "LESS",
                  marginBelow: if(fv!isLast, "LESS", "STANDARD"),
                  shape: local!brandingMap.CardShape,
                  showBorder: false,
                  showShadow: local!brandingMap.CardShowShadow,
                  style: local!brandingMap.CardBackgroundColor
                )
              ),
              shape: local!brandingMap.CardShape,
              showBorder: false,
              showShadow: local!brandingMap.CardShowShadow,
              padding: "STANDARD",
              style: local!brandingMap.SecondaryCardBackgroundColor
            )
          }
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(contents: {}, width: "EXTRA_NARROW" ,showWhen: local!isWide),
      },
      marginAbove: "STANDARD",
      marginBelow: "EVEN_MORE"
    ),
    brandingMap: local!brandingMap
  )
)
